mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT (SEQ, EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, CATEGORY, IMAGE, DELFLAG, PROCESS_STATUS, REFER, STEP) VALUES(REPORT_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{category}, #{image}, 'N', 'N', (SELECT NVL(MAX(REFER),0)+1 FROM REPORT), 0)

INSERT INTO REPORT (SEQ, EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, CATEGORY, IMAGE, DELFLAG, PROCESS_STATUS, REFER, STEP) VALUES( #{seq}, #{email}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, '1', '', 'N', 'Y', (SELECT REFER FROM REPORT r WHERE SEQ=#{seq}), (SELECT STEP FROM REPORT r WHERE SEQ=#{seq})+1 )
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, EMAIL, TITLE, REGDATE, PROCESS_STATUS FROM REPORT WHERE DELFLAG = 'N' AND STEP = 0 ORDER BY REFER DESC, STEP
